snippet.title: Hotel Sowls Trailer
snippet.description:
Hotel Sowls on Steam ::: https://store.steampowered.com/app/968350/Hotel_Sowls/

About this game:  

Hotel Sowls is a mysterious adventure game with unique and appealing 2D graphics.

As an pharmacologist, you managed to get a valuable and mysterious stone after a hard journey and you decided to take a break at the Hotel Sowls.
But the next morning, someone in the hotel stole the stone!
Can you find a stone in this strange and mysterious hotel and find out the secret of the hotel?
